meanings.definition: A woman who has given birth to more than one child.
meanings.sent1: The hospital staff congratulated the multipara on her new baby.
meanings.sent2: The multipara shared her experiences with other mothers in the support group.
meanings.sent3: The multipara joked that she needed a bigger car to fit all her kids.
meanings.sent4: She was like a seasoned captain, navigating the challenges of motherhood as a multipara.
meanings.sent5: The multipara's love multiplied with each child she welcomed into the world.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a woman who has given birth to more than one child.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained the unique needs of the multipara during pregnancy.
meanings.sent2: Her multipara status influenced her decision to join a parenting class.
meanings.sent3: The multipara's baby shower theme was 'Double the Joy' to celebrate her twins.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like a garden blooming with love, a true multipara woman.
meanings.sent5: The multipara's experience brought a depth of understanding to the maternity ward staff.
